snippet: The election has become a street-level fight of neighborhood canvassing and phone banks conducted largely out of sight and distinct from the ad wars.
abstract: Senate race in Virginia between former Democratic Gov Tim Kaine and former Republican Gov and Sen George Allen is coming down to photo finish, with both candidates relying on turnout operations of presidential candidates to eke out victory (Series: New Dominion).
lead_paragraph: The election has become a street-level fight of neighborhood canvassing and phone banks conducted largely out of sight and distinct from the ad wars.

headline.print_headline: With Pinpoint Door-Knocking, Trying to Tip Virginia Senate Race
headline.seo: Door-Knocking Army Tries to Tip Virginia Senate Race
headline.main: Trying to Tip Virginia Senate Race With Pinpoint Door-Knocking
